Change.After: Fixed a bug where Rell's E - Attract and Repel cooldown was scaling non-linearly
When cast from very long ranges, Rell should now properly path towards the target until in range to cast her E
Armor and Magic Resist shred now stacks up to 5 times per target. All of Rell’s abilities will also apply a stack of her Passive

Change.Attribute: Minimum Armor and Magic Resist Steal:

Change.After: Rell keeps resists for the full duration of the Passive buff, even if the target dies
Passive no longer deals bonus magic damage on hit
Hitting a new target no longer refreshes the Passive duration on all targets
Passive no longer applies to minions
Q now stuns all targets hit for 0.75 seconds
Q no longer heals Rell or her allies

Change.Before: 685 units in front of Rell, 150 behind Rell
Change.After: 520 in front of Rell, 220 behind Rell
When Rell casts Q, she moves 100 units forward as she takes a step to swing
On old Rell, Q did reduced damage to enemies after the first, and only applied passive to the first enemy hit. Now it does full damage and applies passive to all enemies hit

Change.Attribute: Dismounted Bonus Armor and Magic Resist:

Change.After: Reduced by 15% (Note: this will be a nerf early game and a buff late game.)
Rell no longer has a movement speed cap while dismounted
Now deals 250% damage to jungle camps
Rell gains 5/8/11/14/17/20/24/28/32/36/40/45/50 move speed while mounted at levels 1-13, reduced by 50% in combat.

Rell and an ally charge, gaining ramping Movement Speed up to 15/17.5/20/22.5/25% over 3 seconds, this is doubled to 30/35/40/45/50% toward enemies or each other. Additionally, Rell’s next Attack or Shattering Strike explodes in an area for 25/35/45/55/65 (+40% AP) (+2/2.5/3/3.5/4% Maximum Health Damage).

Change.Before: Ramps up from 50% of total speed to 100% over the first 2 seconds
Change.After: Ramps up from 75% of total speed to 100% over the first 2 seconds
Rell no longer gains bonus passive movement speed while mounted.

Change.Attribute: Minimum Armor and Magic Resist Steal:
Maximum Armor and Magic Resist Steal:

Change.After: All spells and auto attacks now apply the damage first, THEN apply the passive. (Note: Previously Q, W2, and R would apply passive, then damage, but E and auto attacks would do the opposite.)

Change.Before: Q maintains the original target location after flashing
Change.After: Q maintains the absolute direction after flashing. (Note: This should feel more intuitive and in line with expected outcomes.)
Increased dash speed before the flip once she's locked onto a target. This should both solve some bugs and make the ability feel quicker and more responsive.
Fixed a bug that was causing Rell’s W - Mount Up to not apply bonus damage to Epic monsters.

Change.Attribute: Maximum Bonus Movement Speed Toward Enemies or Targeted Ally:

Change.After: 100% (noteAttack Speed will animate Rell's attacks faster.)
Now deals 5% total Armor/MR magic damage on-hit
Movement Speed no longer ramps up from 75% effectiveness over 2 seconds
5/5.5/6/6.5/7% of the target's maximum health (+3% per 100 AP)
